profile.name: Victor Kirika Njoroge
profile.title: IT Professional | Software Developer | AI Specialist
profile.summary: Results-driven IT professional with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and extensive experience in technical support, software development, and AI data training. Skilled in troubleshooting, systems optimization, and data-driven decision-making. Demonstrated ability to deliver efficient IT solutions, enhance digital infrastructure, and support business transformation. Passionate about AI innovation, automation, and emerging technologies.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Focused on algorithms, data structures, and software engineering principles.
Intensive bootcamp covering modern web development technologies and frameworks.
Foundation in computer science concepts and programming fundamentals.

responsibilities: Provided end-to-end IT support, ensuring stable operations of laboratory systems.
Installed, configured, and maintained hardware and software systems.
Collaborated with vendors for cloud-based and cybersecurity solutions.
Managed troubleshooting requests using ticketing systems.
Automated recurring reporting tasks using Python and Excel VBA, increasing productivity by 30%.
Conducted AI data labeling, model evaluation, and prompt optimization.
Tested and refined conversational AI models for natural language understanding.
Supported supervised learning pipelines with annotation and data validation.
Improved model performance by 20% through QA checks and metadata structuring.
Ensured compliance with data privacy and AI ethics standards.
Designed and maintained websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and APIs.
Built automation tools in Python to streamline workflows.
Configured LAN/WAN networks, routers, and operating systems for clients.
Integrated AI chatbots and analytics tools for customer engagement.
Conducted virtual training on IT maintenance and cybersecurity.
Trained AI models through data labeling for speech, image, and text classification.
Performed dataset validation and quality assurance.
Identified and mitigated data bias to enhance AI fairness.
Applied practical knowledge in AI ethics and privacy.
Trained students and teachers in computing and coding.
Set up IT infrastructure and open-source learning platforms.
Collaborated with NGOs to develop AI learning tools.
Promoted technology inclusion through community outreach.
